thread.title: Broomfield police blotter for Dec. 18 to Dec. 24 - Broomfield Enterprise
thread.title_full: Broomfield police blotter for Dec. 18 to Dec. 24 - Broomfield Enterprise

author: Corbett Stevenson
title: Broomfield police blotter for Dec. 18 to Dec. 24 - Broomfield Enterprise
text: Dec. 18 10:25 a.m.: Theft reported at a residence/home on the 1200 block of Cendar St. 12:16 p.m.: Theft reported at a residence/home on the 13500 block of Via Varra. 3:30 p.m.: Theft reported at a residence/home on the 900 block of 10th Ave. Dec. 19 6:45 a.m.: Criminal trespass to vehicle reported in a parking lot/garage on the 11800 block of Ridge Parkway. 2 p.m.: Criminal trespass to vehicle reported in a parking lot/garage on the 12600 block of Lowell Blvd. 4:08 p.m.: Criminal trespass to vehicle reported at a park/playground on the 2300 block of 138th Ave. 4:23 p.m.: Residential burglary reported at a storage facility on the 5600 block of W. 120th Ave. Dec. 20 6:47 a.m.: Motor vehicle theft reported in a parking lot/garage on the 5100 block of 120th Ave. 9:27 a.m.: Theft reported at a residence/home on the 14500 block of Stargazer Drive. Dec. 21 2:55 p.m.: Simple assault reported at a convenience store on the 7200 block of 119th Place. Dec. 22 12:03 a.m.: Motor vehicle theft reported at a convenience store on the 4100 block of 120th Ave.
